amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part C of House Report 116-264 to exclude lands in the 4th Congressional District of Arizona from the permanent mineral withdrawal under the Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part C of House Report 116-264 to exclude lands in the 4th Congressional District of Arizona from the permanent mineral withdrawal under the Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 243 (Roll no. 599).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 243 (Roll no. 599).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
